text: Lalle ne, waɗanda malã'ĩku suka karɓi rãyukansu, (alhãli) sunã mãsu zãluntar kansu, sun ce (musu): "A cikin me kuka kasance?" (Su kuma) suka ce: "Mun kasance waɗanda aka raunana a cikin ƙasa." Suka ce: "Ashe ƙasar Allah ba ta kasance mayalwaciya ba, dõmin ku yi hijira a cikinta?" To, waɗannan makõmarsu Jahannama ce. Kuma tã mũnana ta zama makõma
